titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5521) to require the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation to revoke the charter of the Federal Asset Disposition Association and reform the process for liquidating assets of failed thrift institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1087.

bill.summary: 10/13/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5521 (savings and loan associations).
